condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened capacities for equitable provision of quality immunization services for children, especially for the most vulnerable and excluded groups

description.narrative: Through various UNICEF-supported initiatives, such as an innovative ‘Immunization App' and a social media blog, parents were provided with better evidence-based information on vaccines, while health professionals across BiH through specialised trainings and are now communicating more persuasively and with facts, to parents about the advantages of immunisation. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of health professionals who gathered knowledge on latest development in field of immunization
